ResearchProjectDef.label: mechcloud chemwalkers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Craft suits of armor at a fueled smithy, inscribe them with runes at an art bench, and allow them to accumulate power to raise eternally loyal servants.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
You now have the knowledge necessary to create suits of armor that can be animated and imbued with power to serve you - but it requires several steps to get started. There are four steps to bringing a mechcloud chemwalker to animate existence:
- Crafting the suit of armor at a fueled smithy.
- Inscribing the armor with sigils of power at an art bench.
- Allowing the armor to accumulate mechanites from the environment - ideally nearby an anima tree and away from artificial structures that may lure mechanites elsewhere.
- Attuning the empowered armor to the will of a psycaster who will command it to serve for all time.
